import React from 'react' import {LinkContainer} from 'react-router-bootstrap' import {Nav} from 'react-bootstrap' export const CheckoutSteps = ({step1,step2,step3,step4}) => { return (
{step1 ? ( Sign In ) : (Sign In) }
{step2 ? ( Shipping ) : (Shipping) }
{step3 ? ( Payment ) : (Payment) }
{step4 ? ( Place Order ) : (Place Order) }
) }
